title: Ep. 543 Liberals and Hollywood Are Now Engaged in an Open War on Religion
description:
In this episode: Do you hear about this inexcusable attack on a Trump appointee based on her religion? http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/dianne-feinstein-and-the-left-revive-religious-tests/article/2633777?utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Examiner+Today&utm_source=StructureCMS   https://www.wsj.com/articles/democrats-and-dogma-1504826418   This poll is really bad news for swamp-rat Republicans. http://www.breitbart.com/big-government/2017/09/07/poll-revolt-brewing-across-america-against-failed-congressional-gop-leadership/   Was Trump's debt deal with Pelosi and Schumer better than the GOP alternative? http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/trumps-debt-deal-was-better-than-paul-ryans-many-republicans-admit/article/2633784   Another liberal Hurricane Harvey narrative dismantled. https://www.cato.org/blog/limited-zoning-will-help-during-houstons-rebuild?utm_source=Cato+Institute+Emails&utm_campaign=635e3b70b8-Cato_at_Liberty_RSS&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_395878584c-635e3b70b8-143016961&goal=0_395878584c-635e3b70b8-143016961&mc_cid=635e3b70b8&mc_eid=3fd7404a34   Why are people buying gold again? https://www.wsj.com/articles/dollar-deepens-dive-as-caution-on-currency-grows-1504859572   Another solid tip for hurricane preparedness. http://www.countryliving.com/home-maintenance/a44682/door-trick-save-your-home-during-hurricane/?src=socialflowFB   Is your diet all wrong? https://mobile.nytimes.com/2017/09/08/well/new-study-favors-fat-over-carbs.html?referer=http://drudgereport.com/
